meanings.definition: Trust or have confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He relies on his best friend to keep his secrets safe.
meanings.sent2: The team relies on each other to win the game.
meanings.sent3: She relies on her cat to predict the weather.
meanings.sent4: The detective relies on his instincts to solve the case.
meanings.sent5: The child relies on his imaginary friend for comfort.
